message.body: Howdy ELF. Can you explain the advantage to buying a xbox 360 vs. a ps3?
Depends on what you're looking for. Most of the franchises are no longer console-specific, but some are, so you have to look at which games you want to play.
Otherwise, PS3 has a blu ray player and the XBox doesn't
on paper, the ps3 seems like the logical choice, except for the price
Try craigslist for cheaper then?
Maybe =/
Unfortunately, consoles seem to retain their value far longer than almost anything else these days, so it's unlikely you'd find any of them for much lower than sticker price
I think Ill offer my buddy $40 for his ps2 and wait it out. The console prices will prob come down after xmas anyway
PS2 is still a pretty strong console lol
I think it's still holding the records for highest selling console ever

see, normally I just play on my PC, but my laptop sucks and my desktop died. I had a wii but sold it. One of the advantages to not being a 'gamer' anymore is that I will be completely satisfied w/ a ps2. By the time the next new console is released, Ill be able to pick up a ps3 for a nickel
I doubt the PS3 will drop below $200 for a long, long time because of the Blue Ray player thing
it will when blu-ray players sell for $20
Which won't be for a while
It's been like 3 years and they're still at basically the same price point they were when they came out =/
if I could pick up a ps3 for around $150 it would be worth it, especially if its backwards comp. w. ps2
http://us.playstation.com/support/compatiblestatus/
looks like it's hit or miss
Ive heard the older ones have a better chance, like the 40gb ones
Oh, and you can get a BR player for about $60 now, prob near $50 by black friday
Huh
I'm happy with playing dvds with my xbox ^_^
http://www.tigerdirect.com/applications/category/category_slc.asp?Recs=10&Nav=|c:4670|&Sort=4
They're much cheaper and I don't give a fuck about picture quality
yeah not top of the line
Ive given up on having the best tech stuff right when it comes out
I do have an HDTV though
Mine's 720, but it's internet capable lol
but now you can buy a 1080p 50" for like $500
and then there is 3D
Supremely disinterested in 3D
I saw a movie last weekend that I think was in 3D
The only 3D part that I remember was the Dreamworks intro when the moon-kid is casting his fishing pole
was it Saw?
Fuck no.
Megamind ^_^
oooh right, I had screening passes to see that but didnt go
Ironically, it was at the KOP theater
I had to go to Springfield, PA lol
but yeah, they were free prescreening tickets
go fig, I was gonna ask you but I believe you blew me off
hm
Oh, you texted, right?
mmmhmmm
I forgot my phone at home like 3 times last week =/
I ended up going to my friends halloween party instead
Did you dress up?
of course
it was a halloween party after all
it was fun, only thing was, it was kinda a couples party (which my friend neglected to mention) and there was one other person there who was single
nice
weird
I just got a random email from a recruiter, directly to my email address, but I have no idea how she found me.
google cant be trusted
